snippet: Top stories from across India this week from the regional press.
abstract: Top stories from across India this week from the regional press.
lead_paragraph: Jammu and Kashmir: Day laborers employed by the department of power development in Jammu city demanded on Friday that the government regularize their services. More than 50 workers were on a protest march heading towards the state governor's residence when the police intervened, resulting in minor clashes, Kashmir Live reports.
